tls:srcline.title: 南宗頓教最上大乘摩訶般若波羅蜜經六祖惠能大師於韶州大梵寺施法壇經

tls:text.tls:srcline: 令善知識於自色身見自法性有三世佛，

tls:line.title: 南宗頓教最上大乘摩訶般若波羅蜜經六祖惠能大師於韶州大梵寺施法壇經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: I shall make you see that there is a threefold Buddha body of your own self-natures in your own physical bodies.

sense.def: BUDDH: Dharma-nature (the true nature of all dharmas; syn. to zhēnxìng 真性 True Nature and zhēn fǎxìng 真法性 True Dharma-nature; often also used syn. to zhēnrú 真如 'Thusness' and zhēnlì 真理 'True Prinicple'; the common basic feature (相) of all dharmas; also indentified with Emptiness (空) which is the common feature of the dharmas (DAZHIDULUN 大智度論 32) SANSKRIT dharmatā; PALI dhammatā
